Post.title: Build Your Blog with GitHub Pages+Hexo+NexT
Post._content:
![NexT](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/26/5c231d3ac8a4c.jpg) > > > Windows 10x64 > > node.js v10.14.2 > > npm 6.5.0 ## GitHubGithub Pages `username.github.io`usernameGitHub ## Hexo ### node.js #### > [Node.js - ](https://www.zhihu.com/question/33578075) **Node.js** JavaScript #### [](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/) **win+R** **cmd**`node -v`Node ### npm #### npmNode.js > [npm - Node.jsnpm - ](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/001434446689867b27157e896e74d51a89c25cc8b43bdb3000/00143450141843488beddae2a1044cab5acb5125baf0882000) > > Node.jsJavaScriptnpmnpm > > AABBXYnpm #### Node.jsnpm `npm -v`npm ### Hexo ```SHELL npm install -g hexo ``` #### `Git Bash Here`[Git](https://git-scm.com/book/zh/v2/%E8%B5%B7%E6%AD%A5-%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85-Git) ```shell hexo init ``` ```shell npm install ``` ## Travis-CI > hexopublichexo > > GitHubTravis-CIhexo[](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2015/09/continuous-integration.html) ### hexohexo 1. clone ```shell git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git ``` 2. hexo ```shell git checkout -b hexo ``` 3. `.git`hexo`hexo init` 4. ```shell git add . git commit -m "" ``` 5. hexo ```shell git push --set-upstream origin hexo ``` ### GitHubAccess Token >Settings>Developer settings>Personal access tokens Generate new tokentoken ![](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/15/5c14c217c5fb9.jpg) token ### Travis-CI GitHub[Travis-CI](https://travis-ci.org/) ![](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/15/5c14c08f2392e.jpg) SettingsGitHubtoken ![](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/15/5c14c305516b7.jpg) ### hexoTravis-CI`.travis.yml` ```yml language: node_js # node_js: stable # ## before_install: - export TZ='Asia/Shanghai' #, install: - npm install #Hexo script: - hexo cl # - hexo g # after_script: - git clone https://${GH_REF} .deploy_git - cd .deploy_git - git checkout master - cd ../ - mv .deploy_git/.git/ ./public/ - cd ./public - git config user.name "username" #github - git config user.email "email@xxx.com" # - git add . - git commit -m "Travis CI Auto Builder at `date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M"`" # - git push --force --quiet "https://${GH_TOKEN}@${GH_REF}" master:master #GH_TOKENTravisToken ## branches: only: - hexo #masterhexo env: global: - GH_REF: github.com/username/username.github.io.git #GH_REF cache: directories: #, - node_modules ``` > > > ![](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/25/5c219ecc93bcd.png) ## > [NexT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) ### > [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/faqs.html#read-more) #### 1. ****`Automatically Excerpt` ```yaml # Automatically excerpt description in homepage as preamble text. excerpt_description: false # Automatically Excerpt. Not recommend. # Please use in the post to control excerpt accurately. auto_excerpt: enable: false length: 150 ``` 2. `` ```html ![NexT](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/26/5c231d3ac8a4c.jpg) ``` ### > [Hexo-Next Gitment ](https://ryanluoxu.github.io/2017/11/27/Hexo-Next-%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0-Gitment-%E8%AF%84%E8%AE%BA%E7%B3%BB%E7%BB%9F/) > > [hexo--gitmentvaline-](https://xiaotiandi.github.io/publicBlog/2018-09-19-d196c9ad.html) > > [ hexo NexT Gitment ](https://meesong.github.io/StaticBlog/2017/NexT+Gitment/) > > [hexo nextgitalk](https://github.com/gitalk/gitalk/wiki/%E5%9C%A8hexo-next%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E4%B8%8A%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8gitalk) > > [Hexo-Valine](https://www.bluelzy.com/articles/use_valine_for_your_blog.html) ![](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/17/5c171d0e2a281.jpg) ![](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/17/5c171f261cf6c.jpg) gitment,gitalk,. / md [front-matter ](https://hexo.io/docs/front-matter.html) `comments: false` ### > [Hexo next](https://blog.rmiao.top/hexo-fold-block/) ### > [**theme-next-pace**](https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-pace) ### > [2017hexo](http://www.cduyzh.com/hexo-settings-3/) > > [ ](https://reuixiy.github.io/technology/computer/computer-aided-art/2017/06/09/hexo-next-optimization.html#%E4%BC%98%E5%8C%96-%E7%BD%91%E9%A1%B5%E6%A0%B7%E5%BC%8F%E5%B8%83%E5%B1%80) #### `description` ![Before](https://i.loli.net/2018/12/26/5c23347219069.jpg) `themes\next\source\css\_common\components\post\post-meta.styl` ```css // before .posts-expand .post-meta { margin: 3px 0 60px 0; ```java
package com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.chanel.channel4.notify;

import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.chanel.channel4.consts.Channel4Constent;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.service.IPayNotifyService;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.utils.PayDigestUtil;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.utils.ResponseUtil;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * @Description
 * @Auther libo
 * @date 2018/12/8:17:39
 */
@Slf4j
@RestController
public class Channel4NotifyController {

    @Autowired
    IPayNotifyService payNotifyService;

    /**
     * status     ,1:
     * customerid 
     * sdpayno    
     * sdorderno  
     * total_fee  
     * paytype    
     * sign       MD5
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/pnotify/channel4", method = RequestMethod.POST, produces = "application/json;charset=UTF-8")
    public void payNotifyRes(@RequestBody JSONObject param, HttpServletResponse response) {
        String status = param.getString("status");
        String sdorderno = param.getString("sdorderno");
        String customerid = param.getString("customerid");
        String sdpayno = param.getString("sdpayno");
        String totalFee = param.getString("total_fee");
        String paytype = param.getString("paytype");
        String sign = param.getString("sign");

        int payResult = 0;
        try {
            //
            log.info("====== 4param={} ======", param);

            if (sdorderno == null || status == null) {
                log.error("====== 4,sdorderno={},status={} ======", sdorderno, status);
                ResponseUtil.write(response, "");
                return;
            }

            String signStr = "customerid=" + customerid + "&status=" + status + "&sdpayno=" + sdpayno + "&sdorderno=" + sdorderno + "&total_fee=" + totalFee + "&paytype=" + paytype + "&" + Channel4Constent.KEY;
            if (StringUtils.isBlank(sign) || !sign.equals(PayDigestUtil.md5(signStr))) {
                log.error("====== 4{}md5{} ======", sign, PayDigestUtil.md5(signStr));
                ResponseUtil.write(response, "");
                return;
            }

            if ("1".equals(status)) {
                payResult = 1;
                log.info("======  ======");
            }

            if (payNotifyService.payHandler(sdorderno, payResult)) {
                ResponseUtil.write(response, "success");
                return;
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("====== 4e={} ======", e);
        }
        ResponseUtil.write(response, "-1");
    }
}
```

package com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.chanel.channel4.notify;

import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.chanel.channel4.consts.Channel4Constent;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.service.IPayNotifyService;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.utils.PayDigestUtil;
import com.dubbo.pay.modular.api.utils.ResponseUtil;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

/**
 * @Description
 * @Auther libo
 * @date 2018/12/8:17:39
 */
@Slf4j
@RestController
public class Channel4NotifyController {

    @Autowired
    IPayNotifyService payNotifyService;

    /**
     * status     ,1:
     * customerid 
     * sdpayno    
     * sdorderno  
     * total_fee  
     * paytype    
     * sign       MD5
     */
    @RequestMapping(value = "/pnotify/channel4", method = RequestMethod.POST, produces = "application/json;charset=UTF-8")
    public void payNotifyRes(@RequestBody JSONObject param, HttpServletResponse response) {
        String status = param.getString("status");
        String sdorderno = param.getString("sdorderno");
        String customerid = param.getString("customerid");
        String sdpayno = param.getString("sdpayno");
        String totalFee = param.getString("total_fee");
        String paytype = param.getString("paytype");
        String sign = param.getString("sign");

        int payResult = 0;
        try {
            //
            log.info("====== 4param={} ======", param);

            if (sdorderno == null || status == null) {
                log.error("====== 4,sdorderno={},status={} ======", sdorderno, status);
                ResponseUtil.write(response, "");
                return;
            }

            String signStr = "customerid=" + customerid + "&status=" + status + "&sdpayno=" + sdpayno + "&sdorderno=" + sdorderno + "&total_fee=" + totalFee + "&paytype=" + paytype + "&" + Channel4Constent.KEY;
            if (StringUtils.isBlank(sign) || !sign.equals(PayDigestUtil.md5(signStr))) {
                log.error("====== 4{}md5{} ======", sign, PayDigestUtil.md5(signStr));
                ResponseUtil.write(response, "");
                return;
            }

            if ("1".equals(status)) {
                payResult = 1;
                log.info("======  ======");
            }

            if (payNotifyService.payHandler(sdorderno, payResult)) {
                ResponseUtil.write(response, "success");
                return;
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("====== 4e={} ======", e);
        }
        ResponseUtil.write(response, "-1");
    }
}
```
